app.title: Proworkbench
setup.title: ようこそ
setup.subtitle: Telegram とモデルサーバーを設定します。
setup.webuiHowToStartBody: Text WebUI must be running in API mode on your computer. Start it in a terminal, then come back and click Test and refresh models.
setup.webuiLoadModelTitle: Load a model in Text WebUI
setup.webuiLoadModelBody: Text WebUI is running, but no model is loaded yet. Open Text WebUI in your browser, load a model, then click Test and refresh models. Recommended model: {requiredModel}
setup.webui.notRunningHelp: Text WebUI is not running on 127.0.0.1:5000. Start it manually, then try again.
setup.webui.noModelHelp: Text WebUI is running, but it has no model loaded yet. Open Text WebUI in your browser and load a model, then try again. Recommended model: {requiredModel}
setup.webui.okReady: Text WebUI is reachable and models are available.
setup.requiredModelHelp: If you're not sure what to load, use this model in Text WebUI. PB will prefer it by default when available.
setup.selectModelHelp: Pick the model PB should use for WebChat and tool proposals. If the list is empty, load a model in Text WebUI first.
setup.testRefreshModels: テストしてモデルを更新
setup.startHelp: Proworkbench will start Telegram now. If the model is down, it will retry automatically.
auth.subtitle: Enter your pb_admin_token to unlock admin pages.
auth.copyUnavailable: Copy not available in this browser context.
auth.sessionExpired: Session expired. Paste your admin token to continue.
auth.invalidTokenHint: Use Generate token only on first setup (no existing tokens), or paste a known admin token.
auth.rotateRequiresCurrent: Paste your current admin token to rotate it.
auth.rotateRequiresLogin: Token rotation requires being logged in. Paste an existing admin token.
auth.rotateNoToken: Rotate did not return a token.
auth.bootstrapNoToken: Bootstrap did not return a token.
auth.generateTokenHelpBootstrap: Generate token requires first setup, or a valid current token for rotation.
common.selectRow: 行を選択してください。
common.noMessagesYet: まだメッセージはありません。

canvas.subtitle: A persistent command center for tool, MCP, and Doctor outputs. Canvas never executes anything.
canvas.empty.title: Canvas is empty
canvas.empty.body: Canvas collects structured outputs from tool runs, MCP actions, and Doctor reports so you can review and pin important results. It never executes anything.
canvas.powerUserHint: Power user mode enables helper swarm controls in WebChat. It may use more CPU/RAM.
canvas.powerUserChip: Power user mode: helpers are LLM-only (no tools/MCP).
canvas.powerUserBanner.title: Power user mode
canvas.powerUserBanner.body: Helpers can parallelize thinking (up to 5). Helpers are LLM-only (no tools/MCP). More helpers may use more CPU/RAM.
webchat.helpers.label: Helpers
webchat.helpers.tooltip: May use more CPU/RAM. Helpers are LLM-only (no tools/MCP).
webchat.powerUserChip: Power user enabled: Helpers are LLM-only (no tools/MCP). Click for details.
webchat.powerUserDetails: Helpers run parallel LLM-only analysis. They cannot execute tools or MCP actions. Use helpers when you need broader reasoning, and keep counts lower on slower machines.
webchat.helpers.config.title: Helpers config
webchat.helpers.config.instructionsPlace: What should this helper do? (required when enabled)
webchat.helpers.presets.note: Presets are stored in this browser.
errors.unauthorized: 未認証です。管理者トークンを貼り付けて続行してください。
errors.network: ネットワークエラー。PB サーバーが動作中か確認してください。
errors.pageCrashed: ページがクラッシュしました
doctor.summary.title: Summary
doctor.idleHelp: Doctor is idle. Click a button to run checks. PB will not auto-fix anything unless you click Fix my setup.
doctor.progress.title: Progress
doctor.results.title: Results
doctor.doNext.title: Do this next
doctor.errors.noReport: Doctor did not return a report.
mcp.templates.title: Template gallery
mcp.servers.title: Servers
mcp.servers.noneHelp: Create a server from the template gallery above. Start with a low-risk preset, run Test, then use it in WebChat.
mcp.servers.emptyFiltered: No servers match this filter. Try All or clear Search.
mcp.table.name: Name
mcp.logs.title: Logs
mcp.create.title: Create server
mcp.create.name: Name
mcp.purge.confirm: Purge stopped/error MCP servers older than {days} days?
mcp.purge.result: Purge completed: deleted {deleted}, skipped {skipped} pending-approval servers.
tools.title: ツール
tools.policy.title: ツールポリシー
tools.policy.safeDefaultHelp: Safe default: tools are blocked until explicitly allowed. High/critical tools should usually require approval.
tools.policy.defaultAll: すべてのツールの既定
tools.policy.providerOverridesHelp: Optional. Keep empty unless you know you need it.
tools.policy.providerOverridesInvalid: Advanced provider overrides JSON is invalid.
tools.registered.title: 登録済みツール
tools.proposals.title: ツール提案
tools.proposals.noneHelp: Use WebChat and ask for a tool proposal. Approved proposals will appear here.
tools.purge.confirm: Purge rejected/failed/blocked proposals older than {days} days?
tools.purge.result: Purge completed: deleted {proposals} proposals, {runs} runs; skipped {skipped} pending approvals.
tools.runs.title: Recent Tool Runs
approvals.title: 承認
approvals.empty.title: No approvals in this view.
approvals.empty.body: Pending items appear when risky tool runs or MCP actions require admin review.
runtime.title: ランタイム
runtime.textwebui.title: Text WebUI status
runtime.runtimeOnlyHelp: PB checks runtime only. Start Text WebUI manually on 127.0.0.1:5000.
runtime.keepalive.label: Keep model server awake
runtime.keepalive.help: When enabled, PB will ping Text WebUI every 15 minutes, but only if a model is loaded (Text WebUI on 127.0.0.1).
runtime.keepalive.failedToast: Keepalive ping failed. PB will pause keepalive for a while. Check that Text WebUI is running on 127.0.0.1 and a model is loaded.
runtime.workers.title: Workers
runtime.config.title: Config
runtime.config.unavailable: /admin/runtime/textwebui/config is not available in this server build.
runtime.models.title: モデル
runtime.logs.title: ログ
runtime.logs.unavailable: /admin/runtime/textwebui/logs is not available in this server build.
runtime.browseResult.title: Browse result
status.title: ステータス
status.telegram.title: Telegram
status.llm.title: LLM
diagnostics.title: 診断
diagnostics.check.models: Models: active profile and model count
models.using.title: Using
models.textwebui.title: Text WebUI (local)
models.textwebui.manualStart: Start Text WebUI manually on port 5000
models.textwebui.noModelLoadedHelp: Text WebUI is reachable but no model is loaded. Open Text WebUI in browser, load a model, then click Refresh models.
models.provider.title: Provider
models.provider.anthropicSetupHelp: 1) Save ANTHROPIC_API_KEY (Advanced) · 2) Add a model id (Model → Advanced) · 3) Click Test.
models.model.title: Model
models.trace.title: Last 10 requests (status only)
telegram.col.label: label
telegram.unblockHelp: Unblock reverses a permanent block. Unblocked users are not auto-approved; they must be approved again.
telegram.allowlist.invalidId: Telegram user ID must be numeric.
telegram.empty.pending: No pending users. Unknown users are currently being ignored.
telegram.empty.allowed: No allowed users yet. Add a Telegram user ID above to allow replies.
slack.title: Slack (Socket Mode, DM-only)
slack.subtitle: Local-first Slack integration using Socket Mode (no public webhook). Responds only in direct messages and only to approved users.
slack.pending.title: Pending approvals
slack.allowed.title: Allowed users
slack.blocked.title: Blocked users
slack.col.label: label
events.filters.title: Filters
events.recent.title: Recent events
events.emptyHelp: Try Refresh, then pick an event type to narrow results.
events.emptyHelpForType: No rows for {type}. Check if this event type is still being emitted, then refresh.
security.pendingOverflowBody: New unknown users are being dropped until you review pending users.
security.today.title: Today (aggregated)
security.topUnknown.title: Top unknown chat IDs today
security.actions.title: Actions
reports.cadence.title: Reporting cadence
reports.cadence.body: Daily report is limited to once per day (per midnight reset). Critical reports can be run anytime.
reports.last10.title: Last 10 reports
settings.hint: Hint: open DevTools and check Network for a failing /admin/settings request.
settings.advanced.title: Advanced (safety)
settings.advanced.subtitle: These settings affect auto-block behavior. Defaults are safe for most users.
settings.advanced.currentDefaults: Current defaults: unknown {v} in {w} min; rate {r}/min
settings.danger.title: Danger Zone
settings.danger.subtitle: Panic Wipe is an emergency action for local troubleshooting. Keep it off unless you need it.
settings.danger.disabledHint: Panic Wipe is disabled. Enable it only when you need an emergency reset.
settings.danger.scopeSummary: This action deletes local runtime data with safe defaults:
settings.danger.scope.kept: Keeps settings, helper presets, and MCP templates by default
settings.danger.confirm.title: Final confirmation
settings.danger.confirm.body: This cannot be undone. Local data in scope will be permanently removed.
settings.danger.errors.noNonce: Could not start wipe confirmation. Try again.
webchat.title: Webチャット
webchat.systemChip: System state: provider/model/policy. Click for details.
webchat.systemSummary.toolPolicy: Tool policy defaults: global={global}, low={low}, medium={medium}, high={high}, critical={critical}
webchat.toolDraftHelp: Use /tool <tool_name> {..args} to draft a server-side tool proposal.
webchat.mcp.label: MCP server
webchat.mcpNeedsTestHint: Run Test on the selected MCP server (MCP Servers page) before invoking this tool.
webchat.invokeBlockedPolicy: This tool is blocked by policy.
webchat.invokeDeniedPolicy: Update policy in Tools page if this should be allowed.
webchat.openApprovalsHint: Open Approvals to approve this run: #/approvals
webchat.approvalDeniedHint: Open Approvals to review or create a new proposal.
webchat.toast.systemStateUpdated: System state updated. Your next action will use the new settings.
webchat.blocked.webuiDown: Blocked: Text WebUI is not reachable at {url}. Start it manually and refresh.
webchat.blocked.noModelLoaded: Blocked: Text WebUI is running but no model is loaded. Open Text WebUI in your browser, load a model, then try again.
webchat.webuiBanner.title: Model server not ready
webchat.webuiBanner.notRunning: Text WebUI is not reachable at {url}. Start it manually in API mode, then click Refresh state.
webchat.webuiBanner.noModel: Text WebUI is running, but no model is loaded yet. Open it in your browser, load a model, then click Refresh state.
webchat.proposal.title: Tool Proposal
webchat.proposal.notReadyTitle: This proposal is not ready to run.
webchat.errors.missingRunId: Tool run did not return run_id.
webchat.runResult.title: Tool Run Result
